attributes.action: End 10 day quarantine from France travel to the UK
attributes.additional_details: It is a con and money making rule in place without any scientific support.
attributes.background: End 10 day quarantine and day 8 Covid tests for fully vaccinated adults and families.

rejection.details:
People who have been vaccinated under either the UK vaccination programme, or an approved vaccination programme in Europe or the USA, or are under 18 and resident in the UK or a specific European country, only have to take a test before returning to the UK from an amber list country (which includes France), and on or before day 2.

The requirements to self-isolate and take a test on or after day 8 only apply to people who are not fully vaccinated returning from an amber list country.

You can read the full rules for people returning to the UK from an amber list country here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/red-amber-and-green-list-rules-for-entering-england#amber-list-rules
